rukus.text: Takheun dilon nyoe meu lon peuingat Tuhan Hadharat sit sidroe Allah Tan laen Tuhan meu kon Droeneuhnyan Sidroe Neuh Tuhan Perkasa leupah
Nyang Po dum langet ngon Po dum bumoe Ngon antaranyoe bandum blah bicah Maha Perkasa sit sidroe Tuhan Maha Pengampon keu ureueng salah
Takheun haba nyoe haba beuna that Haba raya that hana ban peugah
Di gata bandum han tatem pateh Tapaleng keudeh laju le bagah
Haba di langet di alam ateuh Bak lon hana deuh peue nyang geupeugah Soe leh na dakwa nibak ureueng nyan
Wahi atranyan hana troh langkah Nyang wahi bak lon neuyue peuingat Bak bandum umat beunyata leupah
Po gata Neukheun bak malaikat Lon peujeut siat insan Lon ulah Nibak tanoh kliet Lon peujeut jih nyan
Teuma ‘oh Iheuhnyan Lon boh areuwah Oh lIheuh Lon peugot roh Lon yup keunan Bandum teuh keunan tasujud bagah
Malaikat dum teuma geusujud Peurintah maʻbud hana soe bantah
Meulengkan iblih peuteukabo droe Jikaphe jih nyoe akan peurintah
Neukheun hai iblih soe tham kah sujud ‘Oh Lon yue sujud han katem di kah Lon peujeut jihnyan ngon jaroe droe Lon Pakon kah meunan teukabo leupah Peue kapike droe ureueng manyang that
Jiseuot ligat lon leubeh ceudah Nibak apui hu lon nyoe Neupeujeut Di jih Neupeujeut bak tanoh basah
Neukheun treuk teubiet laju kah sinan Ka keunong rajam uroe nyoe di kah
Laknat Lon keu kah sampoe kiamat
Jiseuot ligat wahe ya Allah Tuhanku Neubri lonnyoe meutanggoh Jinoe sampoe troh uroe beunalah Sampoe ‘oh bangket lon Neubri tanggoh
Ka Kubri tanggoh Neukheun le Allah
Hingga troh watee uroe kamaklum
Iblih jikheun lom teuma jipeugah Demi meugah Droeneuh lon peusisat Bandum jih meuhat lon yue buet salah
Meulengkan hamba Neuh lam kawan jih Nyang ate jih gleh keubit ikheulah
Neukheun nyang beutoi narit Lon sidroe
Bandum Kupasoe lam apui mirah Beupeunoh bandum dalam nuraka Bandum keuh sama soe nyang ikot kah
Takheun lon hana sapeue lon lakee Hana lon lakee bak gata upah Atranyoe pih kon lon peugot-peugot
Haba peuingat sagai lon peugah Haba peuingat keu bandum alam
Gata pih saban hana geukeubah Tateupue bandum atranyan teuma Meu katroh masa Neubri le Allah
